snippet.textDisplay: Thank you so much for the informative video. Can you please make one about travel claims, if you use your own car for work-related matters and claim back for that? because apparently there is a logbook you need to keep for as long as you claim from SARS and some friends have not gotten their returns due to not keeping a logbook and obviously some of the travels you forget. Really appreciate it, thank you :)
